org.powerunit.rules

Interface TemporaryFolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExternalResource, TestListenerRule, TestRule

    public interface TemporaryFolder
extends ExternalResource
    This rule provides a way to support temporary folder.

    This class is exposed by the temporaryFolder() method of the TestSuite interface. Created file and folder by this rule (or created inside the once created by this rule) are removed after test execution.

    Author:
    borettim
